results.title: Nuggit & Goofs
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This animated short recounts the story of ‘Nuggit’, an alien and his friend ‘Goofs’ the horse as they go on an exciting adventure into the deep dark forest. They are scared out of their wits as they are surrendered and attacked by enormous black killer spiders. They flee from the forest, never to return.

results.title: The Fisherman
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This work is a video clip featuring the band, “Euphoriac” performing one of their songs.

results.title: Urban poetics
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
An abstract visual narrative about 21st century modern living and the absurdity of life. Themes of urban sprawl, desolation, commercialism and the mundanity of routine and the ordinary are all explored in this short film.

results.title: Shadow
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
Two girls sitting on a bench discuss the recent events of a girl at their school who got drunk at a party and was subsequently raped. While the two characters are having this conversation, a subtitle runs along the bottom of the film, recounting another version of the story that they are discussing.
